daily_req: Wake up and complete the morning routine at 6:00 am.

Continue working on FitCoin preparations from 4:30 pm to 5:30 pm.
Relax and unwind, possibly watch TV or read from 7:00 pm to 8:00 pm.
Refine the FitCoin plan with Rajiv, deciding to launch the test issuance next week, from 8:30 pm to 9:30 pm.
Prepare for bed and unwind from 9:30 pm to 10:00 pm.
